name: atml3-ide-syntax-theme

0.17.0.name: atml3-ide-syntax-theme
0.17.0.readme:
# atml3 theme

An atml3 syntax theme for Atom.

Based on Monokai and originally converted from the [TextMate](http://www.monokai.nl/blog/wp-content/asdev/Monokai.tmTheme)
theme using the [TextMate bundle converter](http://atom.io/docs/latest/converting-a-text-mate-theme).

![](http://i.imgur.com/tp49OsE.png)

readme:
An ATML3 syntax-theme based on monokai-syntax for Atom.
![](http://i.imgur.com/tp49OsE.png)

### Features
* Full Language Support for Atml3 (see https://github.com/axsemantics/atml3-ide-grammar)
* Custom Colors and Code Highlighting for every Atml3 Feature

### Installation

```
apm install atml3-ide-syntax-theme
```

Originally converted from the [TextMate](http://www.monokai.nl/blog/wp-content/asdev/Monokai.tmTheme)
theme using the [TextMate bundle converter](http://atom.io/docs/latest/converting-a-text-mate-theme) but heavily modified.
